description.en_US: Slowly charge up and unleash a powerful tornado in front of you. Dazes and launches enemies upwards.
Slowly charge up and rapidly slash at foes in front of you before unleashing a devastating vortex. Dazes and launches enemies upwards.
Fan forward a cluster of razor-sharp leaves that knock back enemies in the way.
Gather nearby enemies closer to you before fanning forward an rushing stream of razor-sharp leaves.
Lunge forward and skewer a single enemy before launching them away with a dazing burst of wind.
Lunge forward and skewer a single enemy with a combo of stings before finishing off with a dazing blast of wind.
Perfect guard an enemy attack and retaliate with a far-ranged stab that pierces through enemies in a line in front of you.
Perfectly guard attacks for a short while before retaliating with a sprawling wave of thorns which varies in range and power depending on hits taken while guarding.
